About me

Software engineer with experience in Model-Based Testing in the automotive industry, focused on validation, verification, and software quality for complex systems.

Frontend developer with hands-on experience in JavaScript, HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, and build tools such as Webpack. Additional backend experience with Node.js, supporting web application development.

Open to exploring QA, embedded systems, electronics, and emerging technologies in both software and hardware. Familiar with UI/UX and digital design using Figma and Adobe Premiere, with focus on clean, efficient, and reliable solutions.
